base_questions: Walk me through a complex project where you built a feature end-to-end.
Describe a challenging bug you diagnosed — what clues helped you find the root cause?
How would you design a scalable, secure REST API for a book catalog service?
Explain a situation where you improved system performance or optimized code.
What is your approach to structuring a new codebase or designing system architecture?
follow_ups: Can you go deeper into the technical reasoning behind that?
What were the trade-offs of your solution?
How did you validate or test your approach?
If you had more time, how would you improve it?
What metrics or logs guided your debugging process?
